actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the exemption from the self-employment tax for termination payments received by former life insurance salesmen.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Social Security Act to exempt from consideration as self-employed income under such Acts specified termination payments received by former life insurance salespeople.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the exemption from the self-employment tax for termination payments received by former life insurance salesmen.
